1.content:
Ben Baldut
Software Developer

benbald21@gmail.com

(+972) 542628546

https://www.linkedin.com/in/ben-baldut

About Me

• Versatile software developer with hands-on experience with production grade Embedded

Systems with infrastructure integration and automations.

• Quick self-learner interested in taking ownership of problems to build and design modular

maintainable applications while understanding every layer of the stack.

• Experienced with Image Processing, Low Level Programming, Web Development and Hardware

Integration.

Work Experience

IDF - Unit 0099 (Hatal)

Software Developer

2021-2024

• Led and developed a platform for streaming video for AI edge detection analysis on a jetson

edge device.

• Designed a process for optimizing data handling to performance of real time video feed delivery

by up to 20%.

• Architected independent production level components with end-to-end integration testing of real

time delivered live feed from an embedded system.

• Integrated OpenCV with GStreamer for an accelerated RTSP feed, to a real time API control

model serving a full stack interface.

• Automating data validation for testing media server renewing the streaming feed on failures.
• Handling data with an asynchronous C++ backend for RabbitMQ message broker.
• Embedding control logic for video and messaging components into lightweight native desktop

and web applications.

• Integrating microservices component-based architecture with AWS lambdas and EC2 instances

for automations.

Awards & Recognition

IDF

2022

• Military Excellence Award - Awarded for exceptional conduct and contribution in a high

responsibility role.

Education

Cyber Education Program - Magshimim

2016-2019

• Taking lessons in “Magshimim” about a variety of programming subjects, including C, C++, OSI

Model, Python, Assembly, Shell, AI and Reverse Engineering.

Ort Yuvaley Ariel

2016-2019

• Graduated with majors in Robotics and Mechanical Engineering, designing and building a

self-made Ardu Pilot Drone with the ability to control and aim in real time

Skills

• Languages: C++, C, Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, Rust, Go
• Libraries: GStreamer, FFmpeg, OpenCV, NVIDIA Jetson, Yolo, AMQP
• Tools: Git, RabbitMQ, Docker, Angular, TailwindCSS, Tauri

processed_data.summary:
Versatile software developer with hands-on experience with production grade Embedded Systems with infrastructure integration and automations.
Quick self-learner interested in taking ownership of problems to build and design modular maintainable applications while understanding every layer of the stack.
Experienced with Image Processing, Low Level Programming, Web Development and Hardware Integration.

workExperience.title: Software Developer
description: Led and developed a platform for streaming video for AI edge detection analysis on a jetson edge device.
Designed a process for optimizing data handling to performance of real time video feed delivery by up to 20%.
Architected independent production level components with end-to-end integration testing of real time delivered live feed from an embedded system.
Integrated OpenCV with GStreamer for an accelerated RTSP feed, to a real time API control model serving a full stack interface.
Automating data validation for testing media server renewing the streaming feed on failures.
Handling data with an asynchronous C++ backend for RabbitMQ message broker.
Embedding control logic for video and messaging components into lightweight native desktop and web applications.
Integrating microservices component-based architecture with AWS lambdas and EC2 instances for automations.

Graduated with majors in Robotics and Mechanical Engineering, designing and building a self-made Ardu Pilot Drone with the ability to control and aim in real time
